title: 820-00165 Short on U7400
message:
U7400 was heating up when injecting voltage on PP5V_S5 replaced U7400, short on PP5V_S5 now gone and diode reading on PP5V_S5 is now correct, however no boot or USB activity, I tried 2 U7400 just in case before finding out the voltages below. 

U7400 pin 17 is 0V 
U1970 pin 2 is 0V

I think that is my problem, but in this case maybe CPU is dead, please help.

title: 820-00165 Short on U7400
message: Do you get voltage at pins 12, 16, 6?

title: 820-00165 Short on U7400
message: Sorry, I should have included that, yes all those 3 have the correct voltage, 5V, 3.3V and 1.8V

title: 820-00165 Short on U7400
message:
Then you should have voltage at L7430.
Post diode mode there.

title: 820-00165 Short on U7400
message:
Replace again U7400 and check all surrounding resistors.
Be sure to get good solders.
Also change Q7430 and R/C7425.

title: 820-00165 Short on U7400
message: New U7400, Q7430 C7425 and R7425 and same exact behavior.

title: 820-00165 Short on U7400
message: Possibly broken trace, or bad solders.
